pr_title: Improve performance when loading tied jobs

timeline.bodyText: I don't think it improves performance that much, but you could stream the result from allItems() and collect it into a list, avoiding the for loop.
timeline.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText: Rewrote this bit to use streams
replies.author: res0nance

timeline.bodyText: IIRC it reverts the recent change by @LinuxSuRen
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText: Is that so? According to github's blame it seems that this hasn't been changed in 5 years. I changed this as I was in this bit of code and it was warning on my IDE
replies.author: res0nance
